import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Sellbook.css' import { Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Sellbook() { const [bookDetails,setBookDetails] = useState({ bookname:"",author:"",price:"",bookImage:"" }) console.log(bookDetails); return ( <>

Book Name :

setBookDetails({...bookDetails,bookname:e.target.value})} />

Author:

setBookDetails({...bookDetails,author:e.target.value})} />

Price :

setBookDetails({...bookDetails,price:e.target.value})} />
) } export default Sellbook
